title: Mini Crashes (idk what they should be called)
body:
when playing the game i will randomly get ~10 second [crashes?] where the screen goes black and the sound stops but after those ~10 seconds league is running like normal without a disconnect or anything. This hasn't happened with any other game I've played. Reinstalling league doesn't seem to help. Help would be appreciated, because its been inhibiting my game-play. 
Thank you for your time all! Have a good one.

It sounds like you're having some pretty serious driver or hardware failure if things appear to shut down mid-game.  It's really interesting though that it can recover afterwards.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and help individually.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs to the ticket for context.  We'll reply back asap!
